WorkItem.Description:
Good Morning,

I added your .dll to my reference library.  Then I added the following line in mainwindow.xaml
```
        xmlns:chart="clr-namespace:De.TorstenMandelkow.MetroChart;assembly=De.TorstenMandelkow.MetroChart"
```
intellisense autopopulates the entry.  However when I goto add any chart I get the DOES NOT EXIST IN NAMESPACE error.

Any ideas what I am doing wrong?
WorkItem.Summary: The name "PieChart" does not exist in the namespace "clr-namespace:De.TorstenMandelkow.MetroChart;assembly=De.TorstenMandelkow.MetroChart".
